title: "Moonlit Mountains"
content:
# Moonlit Mountains

Welcome to Moonlit Mountains, your source for breathtaking nature photography. Our website features stunning images of mountains, forests, lakes, and more captured by talented photographers from around the world.

Immerse yourself in the beauty of the great outdoors with our collection of high-quality wallpapers. Each image is carefully selected to showcase the majesty and serenity of nature, providing a peaceful backdrop for your desktop or mobile device.

Whether you're an avid hiker, a nature lover, or simply appreciate the beauty of the natural world, Moonlit Mountains has something for everyone. Browse our collection today and discover your new favorite wallpaper.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a full moon rising over a mountain range, with mist and clouds adding to the sense of mystery."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
